original_text: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
korean_text: 지혜 없는 자는 그의 이웃을 멸시하나 명철한 자는 잠잠하느니라

sentences.original_text: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜가 없는 자는 자기 이웃을 경멸한다

sentences.original_text: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace
